basic_info.name: Alice Walton
basic_info.summary: Alice Louise Walton (born October 7, 1949) is an American heiress to the fortune of Walmart as daughter of founder Sam Walton. In September 2016, she owned over $11 billion in Walmart shares. As of February 2025, Walton has a net worth of $121 billion, making her the 13th richest person and the richest woman in the world according to Bloomberg Billionaires Index, after Françoise Bettencourt Meyers.
